Package main.java.util.resources

Class ResourceLoader

java.lang.Object
main.java.util.resources.ResourceLoader
public class ResourceLoader extends Object
Access to resources of interest to the app and its GUI.

May 2024

    • getMapSupportedLanguages

      public static Map<String,Integer> getMapSupportedLanguages(ResourceBundle messages)
      Parameters:
      resource - bundle with localized messages
      Returns:
      map of all supported languages of the program in its locale, with their index in the real English list as value

    • getMapSupportedLanguagesInEnglish

      public static Map<Integer,String> getMapSupportedLanguagesInEnglish() throws ResourceException
      Returns:
      map of all supported languages of the program in English, with their index as key
      Throws:
      ResourceException - in case of issues during IO and resource processing

    • getJdbcUrl

      public static String getJdbcUrl() throws ResourceException
      Returns:
      JDBC url of the translation database for the application
      Throws:
      ResourceException - if database is not found in resource directory

    • getFileExtension

      public static Optional<String> getFileExtension(String path)
      Parameters:
      path - absolute path to a file
      Returns:
      file extension of the file, if it exists

    • getLanguageNamesForMenu

      public static String[] getLanguageNamesForMenu(ResourceBundle messages)
      Parameters:
      messages - : localization of the application
      Returns:
      array of language names to which the app can effectively be localized to

    • getAvailableLanguages

      public static List<String> getAvailableLanguages(ResourceBundle messages)
      Parameters:
      messages - : localization of the application
      Returns:
      list of all supported languages and localization of the program

    • getSupportedLanguages_Speech

      public static List<String> getSupportedLanguages_Speech(ResourceBundle messages) throws ResourceException
      Returns:
      list of all language codes supported by the speech API
      Throws:
      ResourceException
